nodes.documentation: @notice fallback function which refunds ether if the caller is not the grantor. Will accept the ether if caller is the grantor

nodes.documentation:

nodes.name: changePercentage

nodes.documentation: @notice terminateTrust is called by the grantor or trustee in a DApp to kill this contract and send remaining funds to beneficiary
nodes.name: terminateTrust
